caption: Figure 1: Graph representation of action spaces Bɛ (Branzei et al., 2024) and B(PE) (this paper)
description: This figure shows how two corresponding bids are represented in the original action space B (Branzei et al., 2024) and in the new action space B(Pɛ) introduced in this paper. The bids are represented by circles, while the bid-gaps are represented by ellipses. The figure helps to visualize the differences between the two action spaces and how the new action space leverages the regularity of the utility function.
